comments.body:
Is a certificate made by a random org functioning within a relatively unknown college worth something? You tell me lmao. 

IO was a really great initiative unfortunately ruined by money. It was never about the certifications or paychecks until 2020 or so when they started making it paid.

Kinda figured the same, but someone told me otherwise. So I wanted to confirm. 
Anyway gotcha, thank you!!
My friends never received their distinction certificates for the previous slot (slot 17)... Ig we can see the team efficiency ðŸ˜’

Lol nope not at all
I have one,I had forgotten abt it till I re-read ur post to check if u were referring to DAC scholarship certificate, took me a second to realise there's a distinction in PESU IO.

Sheesh
They asked us to come today to collect them for slot 18
Lmaooo so apparently we're not getting them today bcos there's a "small typo" and they need to be reprinted ðŸ’€
Such a good imitative, ruined by dumb priorities and management team
What else can you expect from an organisation whose head is a complete puppet clown and the people working under him are all newcomers? ðŸ’€
